I think that valve need to take more of an approach towards smurfs
Smurfs ruin the entire point of matchmaking as they queue up posing as a lower rank than what they are supposed to be at, therefore causing other players to lose games because they haven't been matched appropriately. This is one of many reasons ESEA and/or faceit servers are so much more preferable to normal valve MM.

Valve also needs to restrict the ability to queue with players in a lower rank. By doing this, players in higher ranks are then placed into low rank games and easily win the game this makes a ranked system completely pointless and makes it exremely difficult to climb the ranks.
